sources.title: Love and Doves | ROMANTIC COMEDY
sources.description:
A timber worker has a wife, Nadya, three children, and a pigeon house. For the first time in his life, he is going to the south on a package tour. There the naive village simpleton meets the femme fatale Raisa Zakharovna and ... returns from his holiday not to his village but the house of his new acquaintance. A new life begins for him that seems incomprehensible and exciting, but there is no home, where Nadya, children, and pigeons are left...

Year of production: 1984

Directed by: Vladimir Menshov
Written by: Vladimir Gurkin
Director of photography: Yury Nevsky
Production designer: Feliks Yasyukevich
Music: Valentin Levashov
Starring: Aleksandr Mikhailov, Nina Doroshina, Lyudmila Gurchenko

metadata.Plot: As a result of a work accident in a remote Siberian village, Vasily Kuziakin receives an injury and a paid trip to a Black Sea resort as a compensation. There he meets a femme fatale, Raisa Zaharovna, and decides to stay with her. Such is the beginning of a new life for him, exciting and strange, but lacking his home, his wife Nadya, his children, and his pigeons.
metadata.Actors: Aleksandr Mikhaylov, Nina Doroshina, Lyudmila Gurchenko
